name: IHE_QRPH_mADX
title: Mobile Aggregate Data Exchange
description: The Mobile Aggregate Data Exchange (mADX) Profile supports interoperable public health reporting of aggregate health data. This data most typically takes the form of routine reports (weekly, monthly, quarterly, etc.) from a health facility to some administrative jurisdiction such as a health district, though there are numerous other use cases such as international reporting and community health worker reporting.
